item.title: 随着项目投资决策的临近，格兰法恩、贡渥签署了为期 20 年的液化天然气供应协议
item.description: 美国能源基础设施公司格兰法恩（Glenfarne）周三表示，该公司旗下部门与贸易公司贡渥（Gunvor）达成了一项为期20年的液化天然气销售协议，从而使其计划中的德克萨斯州布朗斯维尔出口项目更接近于最终投资决策。【原文：U.S. energy infrastructure company Glenfarne said on Wednesday its unit struck a 20-year deal to sell liquefied natural gas to trading firm Gunvor, moving its planned Brownsville export project in Texas closer to a final investment decision.】

item.title: 甲骨文股价因5,000亿美元云计算收入前景大涨
item.description: 周三收盘前，甲骨文股价飙升约29%，因为这家企业软件公司预计，未来几个月其核心云业务的预订收入将超过5万亿美元。【原文：Oracle shares soared about 29% before the bell on Wednesday after the enterprise software company forecast booked revenue from its core cloud business to exceed half a trillion dollars over the next few months.】

item.title: Lyft 和 May Mobility 在亚特兰大推出机器人出租车服务
item.description: 打车应用 Lyft 和自动驾驶汽车初创公司 May Mobility 表示，将从本周三开始在亚特兰大推出试点机器人出租车服务，这是双方合作的首次公开部署。【原文：Ride-hailing app Lyft and autonomous vehicle startup May Mobility will launch a pilot robotaxi service in Atlanta starting from Wednesday, the companies said, marking the partnership’s first public deployment.】

item.title: 华尔街监管机构表示对欧洲环境、社会和治理规则表示担忧
item.description: 华尔街最高监管机构周三批评了欧洲最近两项关于公司披露其环境、社会和治理影响的法律，凸显了自唐纳德-特朗普总统上任以来美国金融监管的转变。【原文：Wall Street's top regulator on Wednesday criticized two recent European laws on companies' disclosures of their environmental, social and governance impacts, underscoring the shift in U.S. financial regulation since President Donald Trump took office.】

item.title: 乔比最快将于 2026 年为 Uber 应用程序提供直升机和水上飞机服务
item.description: 空中出租车制造商乔比航空（Joby Aviation）周三表示，该公司计划最快于明年将Blade的直升机和水上飞机服务引入优步应用。【原文：Air-taxi maker Joby Aviation said on Wednesday that it planned to bring Blade's helicopter and seaplane services to the Uber app as soon as next year.】

item.title: 美国国债曲线将因美联储宽松押注和财政压力而陡峭化：路透调查
item.description: 路透社对债券策略师的调查显示，随着美联储降息押注的增加，短期收益率走低，即使较长期限的收益率仍居高不下，美国国债收益率曲线在未来几个月内将趋于陡峭。【原文：The U.S. Treasury yield curve will steepen over coming months as increasing Federal Reserve rate cut bets drive short-term yields lower even as longer-dated ones remain high, a Reuters survey of bond strategists showed.】

item.title: 英国 JLR 称 "部分数据 "受网络安全事件影响
item.description: 捷豹路虎周三表示，在上周披露的网络安全事件中，"部分数据 "受到影响，导致生产和销售中断。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover on Wednesday said that "some data" was affected in a cybersecurity incident disclosed last week, which disrupted production and sales.】

item.title: 高盛推动延迟报告大额信贷组合交易
item.description: 根据高盛发布的一份内部白皮书，高盛正敦促美国监管机构允许代表投资者出售公司债券的大型银行推迟公开报告此类债券的最大交易。【原文：Goldman Sachs is urging U.S. regulators to allow large banks that sell corporate bonds on behalf of investors to delay public reporting of the largest trades of such bonds, according to an internal white paper published by the bank.】

item.title: 中国报复性关税将挤压欧盟猪肉生产商
item.description: 欧洲猪肉生产商最大的市场中国对进口欧盟猪肉产品征收高达 62.4% 的反倾销税后，他们的利润空间受到挤压。【原文：European pork producers face a squeeze on profit margins after China, their largest market, imposed anti-dumping duties of up to 62.4% on imports of EU pork products.】

item.title: MBA 数据显示，美国 30 年期抵押贷款利率降至 11 个月低点
item.description: 由于预期美联储将在下周的会议上降息，一份疲软的就业报告推动基准国债收益率下降，上周最受欢迎的美国住房贷款利率创下六个月来最大降幅。【原文：The interest rate on the most popular U.S. home loan dropped by the most in six months last week after a weak employment report drove benchmark Treasury bond yields down in anticipation of a Federal Reserve rate cut at its meeting next week.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，英国 Starling 银行希望通过二级股票销售获得 54 亿美元的估值
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引知情人士的话报道称，英国数字贷款公司 Starling Bank 正在准备进行二次股票出售，公司估值可能高达 40 亿英镑（54.2 亿美元）。【原文：British digital lender Starling Bank is preparing a secondary share sale that could value the company at up to 4 billion pounds ($5.42 billion), the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 人工智能引导的摄像头让单人手术成为可能，向手术自动化迈进了一步
item.description: 本周一，智利圣地亚哥拉斯孔德斯诊所（Clinica Las Condes）的外科主任里卡多-丰克（Ricardo Funke）在进行腹腔镜手术时有了一位新助手--一台由人工智能引导的自主摄像头，让他能够独自完成胆囊切除手术。【原文：Ricardo Funke, the chief of surgery at Clinica Las Condes in Santiago, Chile, had a new assistant during a laparoscopic surgery on Monday - an autonomous artificial intelligence-guided camera that allowed him to carry out a gallbladder removal alone.】

item.title: PsiQuantum 在最新一轮融资中估值 70 亿美元，与英伟达合作
item.description: 量子计算初创公司 PsiQuantum 周三表示，该公司在最新一轮融资中筹集了 10 亿美元，估值达 70 亿美元，并宣布与英伟达（Nvidia）合作加快量子计算机的开发。【原文：Quantum computing startup PsiQuantum said on Wednesday it has raised $1 billion in its latest funding round at a valuation of $7 billion, and announced a collaboration with Nvidia to speed up development of its quantum computers.】

item.title: 瑞典金融科技公司 Klarna 在首次公开募股（IPO）13.7 亿美元后，将在备受瞩目的纽交所首次亮相
item.description: 瑞典金融科技公司 Klarna 在首次公开募股中募集到 13.7 亿美元，将于周三晚些时候在纽约证券交易所开始交易，结束了长达数年的上市等待，并巩固了美国 IPO 市场的反弹势头。【原文：Swedish fintech Klarna will begin trading on the New York Stock Exchange later on Wednesday after raising $1.37 billion in its initial public offering, ending a years-long wait for a listing and reinforcing a rebound in the U.S. IPO market.】

item.title: 早间竞价牛市坏消息
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 部长表示，土耳其 BOTAS 公司与 Cheniere 公司签署了 12 亿立方米液化天然气协议
item.description: 土耳其能源部长 Alparslan Bayraktar 周三表示，土耳其国有能源公司 BOTAS 与 Cheniere 公司签署了一项 12 亿立方米液化天然气（LNG）采购协议。【原文：Turkish state energy company BOTAS signed a 1.2-billion-cubic-metre liquefied natural gas (LNG) purchase agreement with Cheniere , Turkish Energy Minister Alparslan Bayraktar said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 电子商务公司 Pattern 着眼于在美国首次公开募股中获得高达 26 亿美元的估值
item.description: 该电子商务公司周三表示，Pattern 将在美国首次公开募股中寻求最高 26.4 亿美元的估值，这进一步表明了新上市需求的复苏。【原文：Pattern is seeking a valuation of up to $2.64 billion in its initial public offering in the United States, the e-commerce firm said on Wednesday, in a further sign of resurgent demand for new listings.】

item.title: 华尔街创纪录的上涨刺激了备兑认购策略的增长
item.description: 对于持有单个公司股票投资组合的投资者来说，华尔街创纪录的上涨增加了期权策略的吸引力，这种策略可以帮助他们对冲单只股票的风险，同时在投资组合多样化的过程中赚取一些收入。【原文：For investors with portfolios of individual company stocks, Wall Street's record-breaking rise is boosting the attractiveness of an options strategy that helps them hedge single stock risks while earning some income as they diversify their portfolios.】

item.title: 独家报道美国警告：太阳能驱动的公路基础设施中可能隐藏着无线电设备
item.description: 美国官员表示，应扫描太阳能供电的高速公路基础设施，包括充电器、路边气象站和交通摄像头，以发现电池和逆变器中隐藏的恶意设备（如隐藏式无线电）。【原文：U.S. officials say solar-powered highway infrastructure including chargers, roadside weather stations, and traffic cameras should be scanned for the presence of rogue devices – such as hidden radios – secreted inside batteries and inverters.】

item.title: Klarna 准备上市，五张图表映射 BNPL 的使用情况
item.description: 总部位于斯德哥尔摩的 "先买后付"（BNPL）巨头 Klarna 周三在纽约上市，这让人们期待已久的分期付款计划再次成为焦点。【原文：The long-awaited New York listing of Stockholm-based buy now, pay later (BNPL) giant Klarna on Wednesday has once again shone a spotlight on the installment plans which have ballooned in popularity among U.S. shoppers in recent years.】

item.title: 标普 500 指数期货在通胀数据公布前创下历史新高；甲骨文跳涨
item.description: 周三，在云计算公司甲骨文大涨的推动下，与标准普尔500指数挂钩的期货触及纪录高位，投资者在等待当天晚些时候公布的生产者物价数据，以了解美国通胀情况。【原文：Futures tied to the S&P 500 touched a record high on Wednesday, driven by a surge in cloud firm Oracle, as investors awaited producer prices data due later in the day for insights into U.S. inflation.】

item.title: 赞比亚法院命令渣打银行就中国房地产债券销售支付费用而非赔偿金
item.description: 赞比亚高等法院裁定，渣打银行无需向一名前客户支付 50 万美元赔偿金，渣打银行在亚洲国家房地产危机最严重的时候向该客户出售了一笔现已违约的中国房地产债券。【原文：Zambia's high court has ruled that Standard Chartered does not have to pay $500,000 compensation to a former client it sold a now-defaulted Chinese property bond to at the height of the Asian country's real-estate crisis.】

item.title: 玛格南首席执行官驳斥 B&J 出售传闻，上市在即，着眼于冰淇淋市场份额
item.description: 在联合创始人呼吁分拆 Ben & Jerry's 品牌之后，Magnum 首席执行官彼得-特尔-库尔韦（Peter ter Kulve）周三驳斥了任何有关出售 Ben & Jerry's 的言论，并补充说，随着 11 月上市的临近，公司正专注于夺回市场份额和销量增长。【原文：Magnum CEO Peter ter Kulve dismissed any talk of selling Ben & Jerry's on Wednesday after its co-founders called for the brand to be spun off, adding that the company was focused on reclaiming market share and volume growth as its November listing approaches.】

item.title: 特朗普提名的美联储候选人米兰在参议院迅速获得确认
item.description: 白宫高级经济顾问斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）预计将于周三通过美国参议院的一关，从而推进他作为美联储理事的提名，并进一步推动唐纳德-特朗普总统对利率政策和中央银行更广泛角色施加更直接控制的努力。【原文：Stephen Miran, a top White House economic advisor, is expected to clear a U.S. Senate hurdle on Wednesday, advancing his nomination as Federal Reserve governor and furthering President Donald Trump’s effort to exert more direct control over interest rate policy and the central bank’s broader role.】

item.title: 巴克莱三个月内第二次上调标准普尔 500 指数 2025 年目标值
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）周三将 2025 年 S&P 500 指数的年终目标从 6050 点上调至 6450 点，这是三个月来第二次上调目标，原因是企业盈利强于预期、美国经济增长有韧性以及对人工智能的乐观情绪。【原文：Barclays on Wednesday raised its 2025 year-end target for the S&P 500 to 6,450 from 6,050, its second in three months, on stronger-than-expected corporate earnings, resilient U.S. economic growth and optimism around artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 中国开展为期三个月的打击虚假汽车营销专项行动
item.description: 中国工业部周三表示，将开展为期三个月的行动，严厉打击汽车行业的虚假营销和其他网络违规行为。【原文：China's industry ministry on Wednesday said it would launch a three-month campaign to crack down on false marketing and other online irregularities in the automotive sector.】

item.title: 独家：文件显示，印度抵制全面加密框架，担心系统性风险
item.description: 一份政府文件显示，由于担心将数字资产纳入主流金融体系可能会引发系统性风险，印度倾向于不制定立法来监管国内的加密货币，而是将维持部分监管。【原文：India is leaning towards not creating legislation to regulate cryptocurrencies in the country and instead will maintain partial oversight, fearing that bringing the digital assets into its mainstream financial system could raise systemic risks, a government document shows.】

item.title: 欧盟负责人表示，欧盟已与美国达成最佳贸易协议
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席周三表示，欧盟与美国达成了现有的最佳贸易协议，确保了欧盟企业相对于许多外国竞争对手的优势。【原文：The European Union got the best trade deal available with the United States and secured EU businesses an advantage over many foreign rivals, the head of the European Commission said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 汉莎航空首席执行官称扭亏计划取得进展
item.description: 汉莎航空集团首席执行官 Carsten Spohr 在法兰克福对记者说，尽管 2025 年和 2026 年将是汉莎努力控制成本飙升的过渡年，但集团的扭亏计划正在取得进展。【原文：Lufthansa group is making progress with its turnaround plan, though 2025 and 2026 will be transitional years as it works to stem spiralling costs, Chief Executive Carsten Spohr told reporters in Frankfurt.】

item.title: 英国监管机构建议取消非接触式银行卡支付限制
item.description: 根据市场监管机构周三提出的新建议，英国的非接触式银行卡支付限额可能超过 100 英镑（135.35 美元）。【原文：Contactless card payments in Britain could exceed a 100-pound ($135.35) limit under new proposals outlined by the markets regulator on Wednesday.】
